The mean decrease accuracy is how much the model fit decreases when you drop a variable.  The greater the drop the more significant the variable.The mean decrease is more significant for variable selection.

10 significant variables:

UC,
AC,
ASTV,
MSTV,
MLTV,
ALTV,
DP,
Mode,
Mean, 
Median
